description:
We are dedicated to solving some of the world's most challenging problems. The ingenuity of our 6,000 employees around the world is core to our success, which is why we work hard to develop our exceptional people.

We encourage employees to think and do things differently, to always look for enterprising, agile ways to create real benefit and added value. Collaborating with and learning from our world-renowned experts makes QinetiQ a very rewarding place to work.


As the defence industry in Australia grows, it is an exciting time to join QinetiQ. What the company looks like today will differ greatly to what it will look like in five years' time.

How QinetiQ supports gender diversity:

  • Each year we undertake a gender pay gap analysis using the Mercer and Workplace Gender Equality Agency’s (WGEA) gender pay gap calculator. 
  • Our Managing Director, Greg Barsby is part of a network of business leaders committed to pay equity and gender equality through the WGEA’s Pay Equity Ambassador program.
  • We are strong supporters of families and offer up to 16 weeks paid parental leave for primary care givers, with no minimum tenure required. 
  • We understand that throughout our lives our circumstances change and full-time, office-based work doesn’t suit everyone. Our employees have access to flexible working arrangements on an ad-hoc or more formal basis. 
  • We realise that happier and healthier employees produce better outcomes, that why we have implemented a fantastic employee benefits program to support our employees at all stages of their careers. Some of these benefits include: Salary Continuance, Leave Purchase, Study Leave, Loyalty Leave, Volunteer Leave, Family Violence Leave, Individual Professional Development Allocation, Salary Sacrificing and Novated Leasing. 
  • For the fourth consecutive year we have improved representation of women in our workplace, creating more part-time roles at leadership levels, supporting industry mentoring and leadership programs and changing the way we recruit.
